name: Accelerate (cattythegamer)
description:
INFINITE SPEED

Go as fast as you can. There is no upper limit to your acceleration!

9 UNIQUE TILES

Drive to your hearts content with an infinitely generating road.

BOTH MULTIPLAYER AND SINGLEPLAYER

Dodge and weave against your opponent in 2 player multiplayer. Or push the limits of the game engine in singleplayer by going as fast as you can.

GOT A POTATO COMPUTER?

Lots of settings to tweak, so you can have the best possible experience.

DAY AND NIGHT MODES

Want the sun? Just enable low quality rendering in the settings to turn the sky to day.

SUPPORTS LINUX, WINDOWS AND MAC

Play on any of the three man operating systems. (Note: Only tested on windows)
